NAME: Floppy Disk
DESC: Size doesn't always matter. Shrinks the opponents paddle by half and removes critical ability.

NAME: Zip Drive
DESC: Size always matters. Increases your own paddle by half and removes critical ability.

NAME: SUDO SU
DESC: Increases the damage done by the ball currently in play by one.

NAME: Lucky Number 0x7
DESC: Explodes the ball into several randomly generated (1 through 7) smaller pieces and sent into a random direction ( 0 through 360).

NAME: Hat Trick
DESC: Creates two illusions of the ball.

NAME: Logic Gate OR
DESC: Shrinks your own gate size.

NAME: Logic Gate NOR
DESC: Increases opponents gate to max size. If gate is already at max size then it also applys a gravitational force into their gate.

NAME: Logic Bomb
DESC: With each paddle hit the ball increases in damage untill it travels into someones gate. Then it resets to normal.

NAME: AntiVirus
DESC: Removes any buffs from the field.

NAME: Disk Cleaner
DESC: Increase your own health points by 2.

NAME: Fiber Optics
DESC: Increase the speed of all balls by # and increase the damage by # perm.

NAME: Bug
DESC: Two paddles instead of one.

NAME: Trojan Horse
DESC: Get # life back from each brick you destroy.

NAME: BitCoin Miner
DESC: Get # life back from every # paddle hit.

NAME: FireWall
DESC: Create a layer of bricks on your side of the field. Bricks break after # hit.

NAME: SystemBoost
DESC: Increase the speed of the ball for yourself when it is traveling towards your opponents gate.

NAME: Proxy
DESC: Create a wormhole on both sides of the field at random.

NAME: Smaller They Are, The Harder They Hit
DESC: Shrink the ball size down by half for everyone.

NAME: Clean Sweep
DESC: Removes all buffs off the oponent side of the field.

NAME: Spam
DESC: Everytime the ball bounces it has a # to multiply. Last # turns.

NAME: Burn Baby Burn
DESC: Burning cards now damages your opponent for # and does not give you Warp Points back.

NAME: JoyStick LVL 1
DESC: Balls become sticky to your pad and waits to be released.

NAME: JoyStick LVL 2
DESC: You can charge up your ball before you release it.

NAME: JoyStick LVL 3
DESC: You can change the direction of the ball.

NAME: SpyWare
DESC: Everytime your opponent deflects the ball you gain # life back. Last # turns.

NAME: Script Kiddie
DESC: Makes the ball invisible to your opponent for # turns.

NAME: Biometrics
DESC: Creates rotating bricks on your side of the field. Bricks break after # hit.

NAME: IPS (Intrusion Prevention System)
DESC: Create two turrets on your field opposite of each other that target and destroy any balls if they are (a) buffed or/and (b) more then one ball is in play.

NAME: Dial-Up
DESC: Reduce the ball speed by half.

NAME: DMZ
DESC: Create two unbreakable on your side of the field.

NAME: Payload
DESC: Reduce your lifepoints by half, but also reduce your opponents life points by half.

NAME: Player Two
DESC: Creates another ball on the field permanently.

NAME: Broadband
DESC: Increase the ball speed x2.

NAME: Virus
DESC: Minus # HP from both players everytime the ball bounces until it passes through a gate.
